About the Company: NutraPlus India Limited (NPIL)is a limited company.NPILwas incorporated as a private limited company in February 1990. Manufacturing unit was commissioned to make APIs and Intermediates in 1995. Various products were made earlier. For a fine organic chemical manufacturing unit first 6 to 7 years period is crucial in a sense that proficiency in handling certain unit processes is developed. Base on such expertise higher value and profitable products then could be taken up. In spite of liberalization of imports, reduction in import duties and indigenous competition, company has withstood uncertainties.
